Trade/Device Name(s): cobas SARS-CoV-2 Qualitative for use on the cobas 5800/6800/8800 Systems
Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and identify nucleic acid targets in respiratory specimens from microbial agents that cause the SARS-CoV-2 respiratory infection and other microbial agents when in a multi-target test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas SARS-CoV-2 Qualitative real-time RT-PCR assay for detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA on cobas 5800/6800/8800 Systems
Indications for Use Summary: Real-time RT-PCR test for qualitative detection of nucleic acids from SARS-CoV-2 in nasal and nasopharyngeal specimens from symptomatic individuals suspected of COVID-19 by their healthcare provider
